msg: Do some cleanup of svnmerge.py's test suite set up code so it is

location of the test repository and working copies.

Introduce self.template_* and self.test_* to refer to paths and

Append '_url' to any self.* that are URLs to the repositories.
Append '_path' to any self.* that are normal paths.
Anytime self.launch() or self.multilaunch() are used, switch to
using the longer names that match the new self.* names.
